attributes.review: This app took about 10 business days to download and while I was on this app I forgot I had left my chicken in the freezer and now my chicken is mad at me and won’t lay eggs . Iam very disappointed with this app. This app is useless. And that’s on Periodt luv.
attributes.title: No ma’am

attributes.review: This app didn’t work cause there is a orange looking dude in my phone that my phone started glitching I guess my phone don’t like a orange looking asz so it’s a bad app just like his life hope your burn in hell 😇✨🧚🏻🧚🏻‍♂️✨
attributes.title: 1 star for taking away our apps

attributes.review: This app is the worst. It serves no purpose as he will no longer be the president of the United States. The app is incomplete just like his sentences, which makes the content unclear just like the future of the American people if he remains in office.
attributes.title: Fitting Terrible App from a Terrible President

attributes.review: This app has A ton of bugs. Every time I open it I see a Cheeto pop up on my screen. DOO DOO BUTTER and it took 2 weeks to download. And the only people that use this app are boomers that don’t know what there doing with their lives🤬😡😢😭😖
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: Okay so for starters this app took at LEAST an hour to download, AND IT EVEN MADE A WEIRD SOUND WHEN OPENING THE APP IT MADE MY BABY CRY FOR HOURS UGHHHH SO OFFENSIVE. It was just soooooo annoying too with that dumb font and ugly color scheme 🤢. This app can be confusing for old people and tech supporters too 🙄 WOULD NOT RECOMMEND !!!!
attributes.title: Slowest app on earth !!!!!! 😡😡😡

attributes.review: This app is absolutely the worst godawful app I have EVER downloaded. It threatened to kill my family and it took months to download. And it tried to take all of my money away and then charge me for first degree murder and fraud. I DO NOT recommend.
attributes.title: Awful app!!

attributes.review: Trump himself was able to contact me and he spit on my dead fathers face!! In the casket and everything! I am beyond hurt and angered by him. Right after the funeral he followed me home and broke my windows!!! That’s right my windows!! I still can’t believe it.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: This app took FOREVER to download and once I opened it I tried to click “next” when I put my phone number in but it was far too glitchy. I hate it and don’t recommend it.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: the app took 42 days to install which was incredibly inconvenient. when it did install, it sent people to my house to beat me up. they then went to the hospital where my 92 year old grandmother was on a ventilator and unplugged the machine. then they flushed my fish down the toilet and gave my dog drugs. when i thought it literally couldn’t get any worse these men brutally murdered my entire family. i do not recommend.
attributes.title: worst app to ever exist

attributes.review: It took about a week to download and it spread false information. If you vote for him this year after everything that happened you are a white supremacist
attributes.title: It was full of misinformation
